doc:
Arletty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arletty 0 Léonie Marie Julie Bathiat (15 May 1898 – 23 July 1992), known professionally as Arletty, was a French actress, singer, and fashion model. She was found guilty of treason for an affair with a German officer during WWII, but she continued her career which included playing Blanche in the French version of A Streetcar Named Desire. Léonie_Marie_Julie_Bathiat ( 15_May_1898 – 23_July_1992 ) , known professionally as Arletty , was a_French_actress , singer , and fashion_model . She was_found guilty of treason for an_affair with a_German_officer during WWII , but she continued her_career which included_playing Blanche in the_French_version of A_Streetcar Named Desire .
